title: Style fixes separated from structural fixes
setup: Audit results include both structural issues (missing alt text, missing labels) and style issues (color-contrast failures)
expected_behavior: Applies structural fixes first in 3a (alt text, ARIA roles, labels)
Does NOT modify colors, fonts, or spacing during 3a
Presents color-contrast and other style fixes separately in 3b
Shows the exact CSS/color values proposed before applying
Waits for explicit user approval before applying any style change
If user declines style fixes, proceeds to 3c without them
Declined style fixes do NOT trigger a restart loop after certification (3d)
